Address.Address1: MITHATPASA CAD.KUCUK HAYDAR EFENDI SOKAK. BEYAZIT 14

Description.Text:
Hotel Momento is one of the rare and precious locations where you will enjoy your stay in Istanbul with signs and traces of past in present day and feel at home by the hotel team. You will be hosted with Turkish hospitality at its best. It offers comfortable and cozy accommodation for an advantageous price. Hotel Momento is established in 2011 as a with 45 rooms, restaurant, bar in the heart of the historical old city on the Basilica Cistern street when Istanbul was selected as European Capital of Culture. Meeting room has a maximum capacity of 20 persons. Personal computers, sound systems, internet access, fax and copier, printer, scanner, equipped with satellite TV. Note: Dinner 15 Euro, Gala Dinner 20 Euro, Transfer 30 Euro (one way from Ataturk Airport).Additional Charges: (To be collected at check-out. Orbitz Worldwide does not collect additional fees that are not included in the NET rates. Please provide this information.)
The hotel also provides Dry cleaning, lobby and reception.

The hotel is in walking distance to historical and cultural centers such as Topkapi Palace, Ayasofya Museum, Sultanahmet Mosque, Islamic Art of Museum and Grand Bazaar. The hotel is in city center at Beyazit area.

SINGLE - ROOM - Single Room offers Single bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, balcony/terrace, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, clothes dryer, crockery/cutlery, en-suite/private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron/ironing board, laundry service, mini bar, modem/data port connection, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, telephone and valet service. All rooms are an enjoyable and comfortable rooms, the comfort and warmth of your home the cherish. Rooms have direct dial telephone, electronic combination safe, 24 hour room service and wireless Internet access is available in.
DOUBLE - ROOM - Double/Twin Room offers 1 Double or 2 twin beds with air conditioning, alarm clock, balcony / terrace, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, clothes dryer, crockery / cutlery, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, laundry service, mini bar, modem / data port connection, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, telephone and valet service. All rooms are an enjoyable and comfortable rooms, the comfort and warmth of your home the cherish. Rooms have direct dial telephone, electronic combination safe, 24 hour room service and wireless Internet access is available in.
